vo-dml:model.name: ProvDM-W3C
vo-dml:model.description: This is the data model for the provenance of observations. It contains the IVOA UML Profile and imports the IVOA_Profile data model with primitive types.
vo-dml:model.title: Provenance Data Model
vo-dml:model.author: Kristin Riebe
Florian Rothmaier
Markus Demleitner
Gerard Lemson
Mireille Louys
Adrian Partl

objectType.name: Activity
objectType.description: W3C term. An Activity is any kind of process, in our case usually a link between input and result data. It is a process that acts upon an entity (data), usually with the goal of changing that entity.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: A unique id for the Activity so that it can be referred to.

attribute.name: startTime
attribute.description: Date/time when the Activity was executed (start time)

attribute.name: endTime
attribute.description: Can provide the duration of the execution, i.e. could also contain exposure time for observation (or is this characterisation??) or how long the pipeline needed to process the image/data set.

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: Agent
objectType.description: W3C term. This can be a prov:Organization, prov:Person or prov:SoftwareAgent; it can be anything that is responsible for an activity or is attributed to an entity.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Name of a person, can also be omitted, if an affiliation or project is given instead.

attribute.name: role
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

attribute.name: label
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

objectType.name: Collection
objectType.description: This class covers data sets like RAVE-DR4 with its databases and database tables or any other collection of data. The data types can be mixed, e.g. a parameter plus n image files. The structure of the collection must be described in the corresponding DataCollectionDescription.

attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

attribute.name: memberType
attribute.description: TODO : Missing description : please, update your UML model asap.

reference.name: entity
reference.description: If pieces of data have the same origin, i.e. were produced by the same activity, they can be grouped to a data set. We decided to leave it to the person/tool recording provenance to decide how detailed a data set shall be separated into individual items.

objectType.name: Entity
objectType.description: W3C term. In our case, these are our data components.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: An id for the data component, could be a DAL-identififier or so.

attribute.name: label

objectType.name: Organization
objectType.description: This is the organization or project responsible for executing an Activity (e.g. the RAVE collaboration). There could also be more than one project involved in an Activity.
